name: Idle Train Station
description:
Fun is always on time in Idle Train Station! Every day thousands of people will arrive and depart from your station. You’ll earn cash but only if you can keep your customers happy and moving! As your station grows, you’ll need to expand your network and upgrade your trains. Travel the world and unlock new areas and stations. All aboard the newest train sensation!

- Upgrade and unlock new trains!
- Travel to new locations with unique environments.
- Earn money to improve your stations!
